name: Roll The Order
description:
Game was originally made for GMTK Game Jam 2022, however i missed the deadline due to personal circumstances. I figured i can still upload it even if no one plays it.

WASD or mouse click to move

You play as a dice whose goal is to collect DOTS from Rolling Stations (blue dice) and serve them to customers (red dice), you have to meet the goal of each level before time runs out.  After winning a level you can purchase a few upgrades using the DOTS you earned.  Losing  means you have to restart all over.
